rows.label: qev050301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hold a moment, human. I would ask you a question.
Do you feel that there exists in this world something
worth defending with your very life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Many hold that even the most noble of acts is
meaningless if the cost is one's life. What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0010
rows.name: Choose Sacrifice

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that there are things worth sacrificing your life for.

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0020
rows.name: Choose Selfishness

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that nothing is more precious than your own life.

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0003
rows.name:
So even those from other worlds think so?
Perhaps Ge Jewhe was not mistaken in her
choice after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Perhaps that is a common belief among those of your
world. And it is an opinion I can respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0005
rows.name:
For instance, I believe that Ge Jewhe could stand
to hold her own life in higher esteem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0006
rows.name: She is a friend of mine, Ge Jewhe. A brave warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0007
rows.name:
We grew up together as orphans. By sharing both
meager meals and shelter from the elements,
we managed to keep each other alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I had hoped that when we departed from the Ganglion,
we might enjoy that life once more. That we might find
a humble, peaceful existence...together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0009
rows.name:
But she left for Cauldros alone in an attempt to revenge
the Ganglion for their insult to Prince Jiarg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Vi Sezha if no one tried to
stop her friend's reckless plan.

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0040
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0041
rows.name: Offer admiration of Ge Jewhe for her boldness.

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0010
rows.name:
The reasonable question of a thoughtful [ST:gender p1=man. p2=woman. ]
For the Ganglion have destroyed entire planets,
and to face them alone is certain death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0011
rows.name:
But the Wrothians hold pride above all—
even the weight of one's own life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Despite that, there were some who tried to stop her.
But in the end, they acknowledged her freedom of will
and sent her off to the end she chose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0013
rows.name: Spoken like a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Many Wrothians also praised her choice the night she
told us of it. They saluted as she left to meet her end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0015
rows.name:
But I could not. Ge Jewhe always protected me.
Pulled me along. She is my truest family,
and I do not wish to lose her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Even if it means defying her wishes or harming her
pride, I still want her to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0017
rows.name:
You seem a warrior of considerable skill.
Could I ask you to go help her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0018
rows.name:
I will pay any price I am able so long as she survives.
Even my life, should it come to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0019
rows.name:
...I am in your debt. And in the event you are too late
and she is already lost, you will know her by the silver
bracelet on her right arm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0020
rows.name: It bears the words, "Let us share this life together."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0021
rows.name:
And if...if it comes to that, I ask that you bring back
her dagger. She always kept it close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thank you, human. I would begin by searching for the
Skell she pilots.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0023
rows.name:
I was a jeweler before coming to Mira.
The bracelet Ge Jewhe wears is one I fashioned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0024
rows.name:
There are two. A matched set. I wear mine always as
a physical reminder of our bond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Please find her. I would suggest you begin by searching
for her Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0026
rows.name:
I do not question the firmness of Ge Jewhe's resolve.
She left for Cauldros with unwavering purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0027
rows.name: She will not be easily persuaded to return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0028
rows.name: Still, I ask that you keep her alive, by any means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ah, those fearless eyes! That mix of sweet aroma and
salty language...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ge Jewhe has returned to me! I cannot thank you
enough, brave [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0031
rows.name:
This sum is nothing compared to the precious life you
saved, but I ask that you accept it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ge Jewhe! As a Wrothian woman, I have always kept
my silence and watched as you put your life at risk.
I respected your choices, and never once judged you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0033
rows.name:
But now, one thing has been made completely clear...
I cannot live without you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0034
rows.name:
Wh-what are you saying? If you continue to speak so,
I will not be able to meet your eyes for fear of
blushing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0035
rows.name:
I will not keep silent any longer, Ge Jewhe. If you try
anything this dangerous again, I will stop you by any
means necessary—even if I must lay down my own life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0036
rows.name:
To hell with Wrothian custom! I would shed my pride a
hundred—nay, a THOUSAND—times before losing you!
Surely you can empathize, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you agree absolutely.

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0061
rows.name: Reply that love can't fix everything.

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0037
rows.name:
I am glad it was you I asked for succor.
The love that fills you is apparent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0038
rows.name:
An understandable reply from a warrior. I expect
it is that same practical judgment which helped
bring Ge Jewhe home alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0039
rows.name:
We will live out the oath etched in our bracelets from
now on. Wherever it is we go, it will be together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0040
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ]. I will never
forget what you have done for me. ...And for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0041
rows.name: ...I am sorry for my outburst earlier. I am all right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Ge Jewhe was a warrior to her core, and I have long
known that this day might come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0043
rows.name:
I shall see to it that she receives a proper funeral.
...If I might have the dagger?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0044
rows.name:
...So sharp. She always kept it so sharp.
It would be a simple thing to follow her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0070
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0071
rows.name: Insist that Vi Sezha not give in to desperation.

rows.label: qev050301_JNK0080
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev050301_SEL0081
rows.name: Offer kind words of comfort.

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0045
rows.name: Your anger reminds me of her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0046
rows.name: Your warmth reminds me of her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0047
rows.name:
Ge Jewhe met death head-on in a manner befitting a
Wrothian warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0048
rows.name: To follow her in a coward's death would disgrace that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050301_MSG0049
rows.name: Thank you. For all you have done.[ST:wait ]
